Felicity Ama Agyemang (amụrụ 15 Ọgọst 1973), nke a maara dị ka Nana Ama McBrown, bụ onye omere Ghana, onye ihe ngosi TV na onye ode akwụkwọ egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe onyonyo Tentacles
Ka oge na-aga, ọ chọtara ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọma na-eso ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri asụsụ Twi "Asoreba"
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye ọbịa ihe ngosi nri ihe onyonyo McBrown Kitchen na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri United Showbiz na UTV
A mụrụ Nana Ama McBrown Felicity Ama Agyemang na Kumasi, Ghana, na 15 Ọgọst 1977
Nne ya, Cecilia Agyenim Boateng, na nna ya Kwabena Nkrumah,  gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe McBrown dị obere
Ebe nna ya gawara nne ya enweghị ike ilekọta ya na ụmụnne ya isii ndị ọzọ, ya na ụmụnne ya bụ Kofi McBrown na nwanne nne ya, Madam Betty Obiri Yeboah
Ya na ụmụnne ya isii, McBrown tolitere na Kwadaso, Kumasi ya na nwanne nne ya na nna kuchiri ya
Ruo taa, ọ na-ewere nwanne nne ya dị ka "ezigbo nne" ma kwuo maka ekele ya nye nwanne nne ya maka inye ya ụlọ anụ na nlekọta
McBrown gara St
Peter's International Residential School, gafere na Minnesota International wee gaa Central International
Ọ gara n'ihu na Kwadaso LAJSS, n'agbanyeghị na ọ kwụsịrị dị ka onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na enweghị ike ịnọdụ ala maka ule Asambodo Mmụta Basic
McBrown mechara gaa Coleji nke azụmahịa ebe ọ nwetara asambodo odeakwụkwọ
McBrown sụrụ ngọngọ n'ime eme ihe nkiri
Ọ zara oku nlele na redio site na Miracle Films ma were ya n'ọrụ ka ọ na-eme iji ngwa kama
Otú ọ dị, na setịpụ, ọ na-enwe ike ịdọrọ onye nduzi mgbe onye nduzi, Samuel Nyamekye, chere na ọ ka mma maka ọrụ ahụ
Na 2001, a tọhapụrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya, That Day, na-amalite ọrụ ya
Ọrụ ya na That Day nyeere ya aka inweta ọnọdụ na usoro TV Tentacles
N'afọ 2007, McBrown pụtara na ihe nkiri " Asoreba", na-emekọ ihe ọnụ Agya Koo na Mercy Aseidu
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
McBrown bụ onye nnọchi anya akara Royal Drinks
Ọ bụ onye ọbịa ihe ngosi nri ihe onyonyo McBrown Kitchen na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri United Showbiz na UTV
Na Machị 2021, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya COVID-19 National Trust Fund
E jikọtara McBrown na Omar Sheriff Captan, onye na-arụkọ ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ nọgidere na-agọnahụ njikọ ịhụnanya ọ bụla
N'afọ 2004, McBrown nwere ụbọchị dị mkpirikpi Okyeame Kwame, onye egwu Ghana
N'ime afọ ahụ, a hụrụ ka ha abụọ na-eme njem ọnụ na Ghana niile na-akwalite ntọhapụ nke Kwame
Na 15 Julaị 2007, e chiri McBrown n'ocheeze dị ka " Nkosuohemaa " (ma ọ bụ emume eze nwanyị-nne mmepe ) nke Assin-Basiako nso Assin- Fosu na Assin North District nke Central Region, Ghana
N’afọ 2016, ọ lụrụ enyi ya bụ́ Maxwell Mawu Mensah
Na February 2019 McBrown mụrụ nwa nwanyi na Canada

McBrown emeela n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ma nwee ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Bekee kacha mma, onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'ọrụ ndu, ihe nkiri ọdịnala kacha mma na akụkọ kacha mma na 2011 Kumawood Awards
Ọ merikwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọkacha mmasị na 2016 Ghana Movie Awards na Eurostar Nwanyi achasị mma iyi uwe ama ama na kapeeti uhie na 2016 Ghana Movie Awards
O nwetakwara onye na-eme ihe nkiri Golden na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị na ihe nkiri SideChic Gang na Golden Movie Awards na 2018
Na 2020, e nyere ya ihe nrite Redio na Television Personality Awards TV Female Entertainment Show Onye ọbịa nke afọ 2019 – 2020
Ọ họpụtakwara ihe nrite ihe nrite nke nwanyị TV nke afọ 2019–2020
N'afọ 2020 ọ meriri ihe nrite maka nwanyị mara mma Brand Influencer na mbipụta nke atọ nke Ghana Outstanding Women Awards (GOWA)
Na Machị 2021, e nyere ya ihe nkiri nwanyị nke afọ na ihe nrite ihe ntụrụndụ
